snippet: John C. Liu, the city comptroller, announced his mayoral campaign on the steps of City Hall with a populist pitch and taking aim at Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg.
abstract: City Comptroller John C Liu announces his New York City mayoral campaign on the steps of City Hall with a populist pitch and taking aim at Mayor Michael R Bloomberg.
lead_paragraph: John C. Liu, the city comptroller, announced his mayoral campaign on the steps of City Hall with a populist pitch and taking aim at Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg.

headline.seo: Assailing Bloomberg, Liu Enters Race to Replace Him
headline.main: Criticizing Bloomberg, Liu Enters Race to Succeed Him
headline.print_headline: Criticizing Bloomberg, Liu Enters Race to Succeed Him
